item.title: Chromium Ozone-GBM explained
item.author: Author
item.description: I’ve wrote an article about the new graphics platform for Chromium called Ozone-GBM. I particularly think that Ozone-GBM will play an important role next in Chromium and Linux graphics communities in general. I hope you enjoy the read :) Please share it. https://01.org/chromium/blogs/tiagovignatti/2014/chromium-ozone-gbm-explained
